articles.title: Cyril Ramaphosa says Afrikaners 'running away' from South Africa to US are 'cowards' - BBC
articles.description: South Africans are resilient and don't run away from their problems, President Ramaphosa says.
articles.content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa has called a group of 59 white South Africans who have moved to the US to resettle "cowards", saying "they'll be back soon".
The group of Afrikaners arrived in the US on Mo… [+3287 chars]
